name: @affinidi/internal-api-clients
description: SDK core monorepo for affinity DID solution

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:only
scripts.test:integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration/index.test.ts -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 115000
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha -r ts-node/register test/unit/index.test.ts test/integration/index.test.ts -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 55000
scripts.test:coverage:codeclimate: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha -r ts-node/register test/unit/index.test.ts test/integration/index.test.ts -p ./tsconfig.json --timeout 55000 && $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/tmp/cc-test-reporter format-coverage -t lcov -o $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/tmp/codeclimate.core.json coverage/lcov.info --add-prefix $(pwd | rev | cut -d'/' -f-2 | rev)

author: Denis Popov <denis@slatestudio.com>
